tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_renewal_reminders (
    reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_name VARCHAR(50),
    policy_number VARCHAR(20),
    renewal_date DATE,
    reminder_sent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE policyholders (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    policy_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    renewal_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE policies (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_number VARCHAR(50),
  policyholder_id INT REFERENCES policyholders(policyholder_id),
  coverage VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE policyholders (
    policyholder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    policy_number VARCHAR(20),
    renewal_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_id UUID,
    reminder_date DATE,
    reminder_message TEXT,
    sent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_id UUID,
    email_sent_date TIMESTAMP,
    email_subject VARCHAR(255),
    email_body TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE renewal_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_id UUID,
    renewal_date DATE,
    renewal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_id INT REFERENCES Policyholders(policyholder_id),
    policy_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
